Room.Name: Lyanden Road
Room.ShortDescription: Farther south on this wide road is Prince Ragnar's Castle.
Room.LongDescription: To the north there is an Enchanted Forest where many strange peoples and animals are said to live. To the west the Lyanden Road will eventually lead to the great city of Oceancrest by the Respitial Sea. Oceancrest was built on the Nylandian Bay, and serves as a major trading port for other parts of the world. They say you can get anything at all in Oceancrest.
